nodes.text: House Rist was the estate of House Rist, one of the Great Houses of Alderaan, that was located in the Juran Mountains on Alderaan. Around 3643 BBY it was infiltrated by Cipher Nine, an agent of the reconstituted Sith Empire's intelligence agency, in order to find and neutralize Denri Ayl. Victor Rist also was killed within the walls of the estate during that year.
